appName.description: Name of BKG Webmap implementation. This will be used in export JSON.

initialize.description: Tool that should be shown, wenn starting the Application. If empty or null, then panel will be closed.

resultsMaxZoom.description: Max value for zooming to result features. Default: 13.

suggestCount.description: Suggestion results that will be fetched.

templatePopup.description: Template for popups (e.g. '< b>${text}< /b>< br/>${typ}< br/>(${geometry.x} {$geometry.y})').

templateList.description: Template for results list. (e.g. '< b>${text}< /b>< br/>${typ}< br/>(${geometry.x} {$geometry.y})').

protocol.description: Protocol used for geoSearch control. Default: ortssuche

maxResolution.description: Maximum resolution. If null, maxZoom will be used.

minResolution.description: Minimum resolution. If null, minZoom will be used.

maxZoom.description: Maximum zoom. It will be used only if maxResolution is null.

minZoom.description: Minimum zoom. It will be used only if minResolution is null.

url.description: Service URL. Use it only if need to change predefined URL.

coordinates.description: Array with coordinates [minX, minY, maxX, maxY]

projection.description: Projection of layer. If null, then map projection will be used.

wfs.description: Properties of a WFS service used in geoSearch
wfs.title: wfs

showAttributes.description: Array of attributes that are shown as result

format.description: Format of WFS service. If null, then GML3 will be used

editStyle.description: The user can change style of vector layers.

changeVisibility.description: The user can change visibility of layers.

changeOrder.description: The user can change the layer order.

showWMSLayers.description: Show layers of WMS Services in menu.

openLevel.description: Define which level of layerswitcher should be open. 0: Menu is closed, 1: Basemaps/Overlays menu is open, 2: Group layers are open

customLayers.description: The user can add new layers.

changeVisibility.description: The user can change visibility of custom layers.

defaultStyle.description: Default style of custom vector layers. Use /styles/items/name.

items.description: Layer types that can be added.

showAttributes.description: Show attributes with click on map

emptyLayer.description: If edit is active and there is no vector layer, add an empty vector layer.

stylesheet.description: URL of stylesheet file that can be used when printing.

permaLink.description: Use URL paramaters for exporting-importing map status

jsonExport.description: Export-Import JSON with current status of application

appName.description: Name of BKG Webmap implementation that will be used in exported JSON.

showZoomLevel.description: Show zoom level as text under the zoom buttons.

position.description: Position of control. It will be used only if div is null. Values: 'top-left', 'top-right', 'bottom-left', 'bottom-right' or CSS properties (e.g. 'left: 5px; top: 10px;')

onlyFullScreen.description: Tool available only in full screen mode.

position.description: Position of control. It will be used only if div is null. Values: 'top-left', 'top-right', 'bottom-left', 'bottom-right' or CSS properties (e.g. 'left: 5px; top: 10px;')

onlyFullScreen.description: Tool available only in full screen mode.

position.description: Position of control. It will be used only if div is null. Values: 'top-left', 'top-right', 'bottom-left', 'bottom-right' or CSS properties (e.g. 'left: 5px; top: 10px;')

onlyFullScreen.description: Tool available only in full screen mode.

position.description: Position of control. It will be used only if div is null. Values: 'top-left', 'top-right', 'bottom-left', 'bottom-right' or CSS properties (e.g. 'left: 5px; top: 10px;')
Position of control. It will be used only if div is null. Values: 'top-left', 'top-right', 'bottom-left', 'bottom-right' or CSS properties (e.g. 'left: 5px; top: 10px;')

title.description: Title for link shown on hover.

content.description: Content for link. Markup is allowed.

onlyFullScreen.description: Link available only in full screen mode.

active.description: Should window be initially open or close

position.description: Position of control. It will be used only if div is null. Values: CSS properties (e.g. 'left: 5px; top: 10px;')

size.description: Size of window in pixel [width, height]

content.description: Content for window. Markup is allowed.

onlyFullScreen.description: Window available only in full screen mode.

position.description: Position of control. It will be used only if div is null. Values: 'top-left', 'top-right', 'bottom-left', 'bottom-right' or CSS properties (e.g. 'left: 5px; top: 10px;')
Position of control. It will be used only if div is null. Values: 'top-left', 'top-right', 'bottom-left', 'bottom-right' or CSS properties (e.g. 'left: 5px; top: 10px;')

layers.description: Array with layer IDs that should be shown in overview map. If empty or null, all layers will be used.

onlyFullScreen.description: Tool available only in full screen mode.

position.description: Position of control. It will be used only if div is null. Values: 'top-left', 'top-right', 'bottom-left', 'bottom-right' or CSS properties (e.g. 'left: 5px; top: 10px;')

cookieCheck.description: Should the application use cookie test.

center.description: Initial center of map (The coordinate system is defined through the projection)

resolution.description: Initial resolution. If null, zoom will be used.

resolutions.description: Array with numbers. If set, scales, maxResolution, minResolution, minZoom, and maxZoom are ignored.

scales.description: Array with numbers. It will be used only if resolutions is null. If set, maxResolution, minResolution, minZoom, and maxZoom are ignored.

zoom.description: Initial zoom. It will be used only if resolution is null.

mapExtent.description: Initial map extent. Array with numbers: [minX, minY, maxX, maxY]

maxResolution.description: Maximum resolution. It will be used only if resolutions and scales are null. If null, maxZoom will be used.

minResolution.description: Minimum resolution. It will be used only if resolutions and scales are null. If null, minZoom will be used.

maxZoom.description: Maximum zoom. It will be used only if maxResolution, resolutions and scales are null.

minZoom.description: Minimum zoom. It will be used only if minResolution, resolutions and scales are null.

defaultStyle.description: Default style for layers. This value can be overridden by each layer options

layers.description: All layers that will be loaded on map

baseLayers.description: Base layers. The order of layers will be used in menu.

items.description: Groups of layers or single layers.

overlays.description: Layers and group of layers that will be loaded as overlays. The order of layers will be used in menu.

items.description: Groups of layers or single layers.

id.description: Unique ID. It will be used in permaLink and persistence JSON. If not available, it will be added by Framework.

name.description: Name of layer shown in Menu.

layers.description: Layers of specific service that should be loaded. If empty, then all available layers will be loaded.

name.description: Name of layer shown in Menu.

selectStyle.description: The user is able to select a style for this layer.

legendUrl.description: URL for legend. If empty or null, legend will be loaded using GetLegendGraphic.

version.description: WMS version. If null, 1.3.0 will be used.

srsName.description: Projection of layer. If null, then EPSG 25832 will be used.

legendUrl.description: URL for legend. If empty or null, legend will be loaded using GetLegendGraphic. It has priority over legendUrl in each WMS-Layer (/layers/WMS/layers/items/legendUrl).

bgcolor.description: Definition for the BGCOLOR request parameter. e.g. 0xFFFFFF

copyright.description: Copyright. If null or empty it will be parsed from GetCapabilities

values.description: Specify time range and interval in format defined in property 'format'. If this is not defined, ISO 8601 format will be used. Example: '2016-03-10T23:00:00.000Z/2016-03-15T23:00:00.000Z/P1D'. Infos: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601.

format.description: Time format (Year: 'yy'|'yyyy' - Month: 'mm', Day: 'dd'. Example: 2015-03-22). If not defined, ISO 8601 format will be used.

mode.description: Time slider mode. Values: 'period|time'. If not defined, both modes will be used.

id.description: Unique ID. It will be used in permaLink and persistence JSON. If not available, it will be added by Framework.

name.description: Name of layer shown in Menu.

url.description: Service-URL. If the URL ends with .xml, then make a getCapabilites request and use the response to load the layer.

origin.description: Tile grid origin. Array with numbers [lon, lat] or null.

matrixIds.description: Array with strings. The length of this array needs to match the length of the resolutions array.

srsName.description: Projection of layer. If null, then EPSG 25832 will be used.

style.description: Style of WMTS. If null, default will be loaded.

copyright.description: Copyright. If null or empty it will be parsed from GetCapabilities

id.description: Unique ID. It will be used in permaLink and persistence JSON. If not available, it will be added by Framework.

name.description: Name of layer shown in menu.

srsName.description: Projection of layer. If null, then EPSG 25832 will be used.

format.description: Format for WFS layers. If null, then GML3 will be used

version.description: WFS version. If null, 1.1.0 will be used.

copyright.description: Copyright. If null or empty it will be parsed from GetCapabilities

id.description: Unique ID. It will be used in permaLink and persistence JSON. If not available, it will be added by Framework.

name.description: Name of layer shown in menu.

srsName.description: Coordinate system of markers. If null, then EPSG 4326 will be used.

coordinates.description: Coordinates of marker. The coordinate system is defined through srsName

content.description: Content for info area. Markup is allowed.

id.description: Unique ID. It will be used in permaLink and persistence JSON. If not available, it will be added by Framework.

name.description: Name of layer shown in menu.

srsName.description: Coordinate system of markers. If null, then EPSG 4326 will be used.

header.description: Should the first row be used as header.

columnsToParse.description: Names (strings) or positions (integer) of columns that should be used as attributes. 1 is the start position. If null, then all columns will be used.

columnNames.description: Define custom column names. Used only if header is false. The length should be the same as in columnsToParse.

LatColumn.description: Name (string) or position (integer) of column with coordinates (Lat). The coordinate system is defined through srsName.

LonColumn.description: Name (string) or position (integer) of column with coordinates (Lon). The coordinate system is defined through srsName.

encoding.description: The encoding to use when opening the file.

id.description: Unique ID. It will be used in permaLink and persistence JSON. If not available, it will be added by Framework.

name.description: Name of layer shown in menu.

srsName.description: Coordinate system of markers. If null, then EPSG 4326 will be used.

header.description: Should the first row be used as header.

columnsToParse.description: Names (strings) or positions (integer) of columns that should be used as attributes. 1 is the start position. If null, then all columns will be used.

columnNames.description: Define custom column names. Used only if header is false. The length should be the same as in columnsToParse.

LatColumn.description: Name (string) or position (integer) of column with coordinates (Lat). The coordinate system is defined through srsName.

LonColumn.description: Name (string) or position (integer) of column with coordinates (Lon). The coordinate system is defined through srsName.

id.description: Unique ID. It will be used in permaLink and persistence JSON. If not available, it will be added by Framework.

name.description: Name of layer shown in menu.

id.description: Unique ID. It will be used in permaLink and persistence JSON. If not available, it will be added by Framework.

name.description: Name of layer shown in menu.

ref.description: Reference of layer in BKG layer registry. This is the name of BKG layer to load.

srsName.description: Projection of layer. If null, then map projection will be used.

properties.description: Updates for the layer that will overwrite the preconfigured values. The complete set of available properties depends on the preconfigured layer class.

copyright.description: Copyright. If null or empty it will be parsed from GetCapabilities

id.description: Unique ID. It will be used in permaLink and persistence JSON. If not available, it will be added by Framework.

layers.description: List of layers in a group. The position in this list will determine the position on map.

id.description: Unique ID. It will be used in permaLink and persistence JSON. If not available, it will be added by Framework.

styles.description: Add styles to use on vector layers

name.description: Name of style. This should be used as reference for a layer.

fillColor.description: Fill color for vector layers. A hexadecimal value.

strokeColor.description: Stroke color for vector layers. A hexadecimal value.

name.description: Name of style. This should be used as reference for a layer.

image.description: Styling points. Use only one key of the following. If more than one keys are used, this is the reading order: regularShape->icon->circle (last overwrites first)
